member.name: STGTY
member.summary: TheSTGTY enumeration values are used in the type member of the structure to indicate the type of the storage element. A storage element is a storage object, a stream object, or a byte-array object (LOCKBYTES).

member.name: STGTY.STGTY_STORAGE
member.summary: Indicates that the storage element is a storage object.

member.name: STGTY.STGTY_STREAM
member.summary: Indicates that the storage element is a stream object.

member.name: STGTY.STGTY_LOCKBYTES
member.summary: Indicates that the storage element is a byte-array object.

member.name: STGTY.STGTY_PROPERTY
member.summary: Indicates that the storage element is a property storage object.
